title: Visiting the Doctor

stages.name: Check-in
stages.ai_opening: Hello, I'm Dr. Smith. What brings you in today?
stages.learning_tip: 증상을 설명할 때 'I have a...' 또는 'I've been experiencing...'
suggested_responses: I've been having headaches for a few days.
I have a sore throat and a cough.
I've been feeling really tired lately.

stages.name: Examination
stages.learning_tip: 'It started...' 'It gets worse when...'로 상세히 설명
suggested_responses: It started about three days ago.

stages.name: Diagnosis
stages.learning_tip: 이해가 안 되면 'Could you explain that again?'
suggested_responses: How long will it take to recover?

stages.name: Prescription
stages.learning_tip: 복용법은 'How often should I take this?'로 확인
suggested_responses: How many times a day should I take this?
Do I need a follow-up appointment?

completion_message: Great job completing the Visiting the Doctor scenario!
